aircraft.value: Falcon Prime - AC-9937-139 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 22/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 24/05/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 24/05/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 25/05/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 31/05/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
